name: Aftermath
description:
As a soldier, you were secretly thrown onto a small island.

There is only a small reserve of ammunition and supplies on the ground.

You need to use firearms reasonably to kill all monsters.

Take it seriously, soldier!

Pick up your weapons and start fighting!

Mobile=WASD

Gun shooting=left mouse button

Game features:

1. The screen is delicate and the sound effect is realistic. The graphics are very exquisite and the sound effect is realistic, giving players a very realistic feeling in the game.

2. Easy to operate and use. The operation is very simple, and new players can easily get started, while also achieving a certain level of tactical gameplay.



Game features:

In the game, you can obtain different firearms and experience the feeling of different firearms.

The tense and exciting rhythm makes the palms sweat at any time.

Explore the Wide Map

Players must collect weapons to counter enemies.
